name: Hidden Object: Coyote the Outlander
description:
“Coyote the Outlander” is a steampunk adventure hidden object game set in Wild West World. Follow Coyote and Caesar and their adventures.
It is based on awards winning novel under the same name.
Enjoy searching for items in colorful steampunk locations. Different game modes, cleverly hidden objects and increasing difficulty will make your adventure nice, relaxing and challenging.

Game features:
-Hidden object adventure game in the steampunk Wild West scenery
- 34 hidden object scenes
- 15 unique locations
- Over 500 objects hidden
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find.
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Three difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenging
- HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
